traits.name: 8-bit
traits.desc: Keep score of your team's damage dealt. For each high score you beat, 8-bit champions gain Attack Damage.

stats.6: 14% AD and unlock a final high score, that rewards you with a grand prize.

traits.name: Bruiser
traits.desc: Your team gains 100 Health. Bruisers gain bonus max Health.

stats.1: Akali is a member of K/DA or True Damage depending on which trait has more fielded champions. She gains a different Ability depending on which form she takes.
The Maestro always attacks at a fixed pace, converting 1% bonus Attack Speed into 0.7% Attack Damage.

traits.name: Country
traits.desc: When your team loses 30% of their Health, call a Dreadsteed that empowers your team. Each Country star level increases the Dreadsteed's Health and Attack Damage.

traits.name: Crowd Diver
traits.desc:
After Crowd Divers die, they leap onto the furthest enemy, dealing 300 magic damage. Enemies within 1 hex are Stunned for 1.5 seconds.

They also gain Damage Amp, increased by 1% each second.

traits.name: Dazzler
traits.desc: Dazzlers' Abilities reduce their target's damage by 10% and deal bonus magic damage over 2 seconds.

traits.name: Big Shot
traits.desc: Big Shots gain Attack Damage, which increases for 3 seconds when they use their Ability.

stats.1: Choose a mode that changes the Mixmaster's attacks and Ability!

traits.name: Edgelord
traits.desc: Edgelords gain Attack Speed, which doubles when their target drops below 50% Health. Edgelords with 1-hex range also dash through them on their next attack.

traits.name: EDM
traits.desc:
Use the EDM selector item to choose an EDM champion and see the frequency for each.

At the selected champion's frequency, your EDM champions cast the selected Ability with modified effectiveness.

traits.name: Emo
traits.desc: Emo champions' Abilities cost less Mana to cast, and they gain Mana whenever an allied champion dies.

traits.name: Executioner
traits.desc: Executioner Abilities can critically strike and they gain Critical Strike Damage. Their Critical Strike Chance is increased based on their target's missing Health.

stats.2: 5% Crit Damage, Up to 25% Crit Chance
stats.4: 15% Crit Damage, Up to 80% Crit Chance
stats.6: 30% Crit Damage, Up to 160% Crit Chance

traits.name: Mosher
traits.desc: Moshers gain Attack Speed and Omnivamp, which increases up to 100% based on their missing Health.

traits.name: Disco
traits.desc:
Summon a movable Disco Ball.

Combat start: Allies next to it gain Attack Speed and healing immediately and every 3 seconds.

stats.5: 2 Disco Balls, 12% Attack Speed, and 3% max Health

traits.name: Guardian
traits.desc: Once per combat at 50% Health, Guardians shield themselves and their closest ally for a percent of their max Health.

traits.name: Hyperpop
traits.desc: When Hyperpop champions use an Ability, they grant Mana and 4 seconds of Attack Speed to their 2 closest allies.

stats.1: Gain 2/2/8 placeable Spirit Tentacles, based on Illaoi's star level. Tentacles gain Illaoi's bonus Armor and Magic Resist.

traits.name: Jazz
traits.desc: For each active trait (except uniques), your team gains bonus Health and Damage Amp.

traits.name: K/DA
traits.desc: Your team gains max Health, Ability Power, and Attack Damage if they are in a lighted hex. K/DA champions gain double!

stats.10: +45% max Health, +45 AP & AD, 10 mana per second

traits.name: Pentakill
traits.desc:
Pentakill champions gain 15% Durability and Damage Amp. For each champion kill, a Pentakill champion rocks out, increasing its Damage Amp by 25%.

On the 5th kill, all Pentakill champions rock out and your team gains 50% Attack Speed.

traits.name: Heartsteel
traits.desc: Earn Hearts by killing enemies. Gain even more by losing player combat. Every 4 player combats, convert Hearts into powerful rewards!

stats.10: 18x Hearts, Gain rewards every round and keep 80% of your Hearts!

traits.name: Punk
traits.desc:
Punks gain bonus Health and Attack Damage, which increases by 1% every time you spend gold on a Shop reroll.

After Punks fight in combat, gain a 1 gold Reroll for that round. Your first reroll each round grants 3% bonus instead!

traits.name: Rapidfire
traits.desc:
Your team gains 10% Attack Speed.

Rapidfire champions gain more on every attack, up to 10 stacks.

traits.name: Sentinel
traits.desc: Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist. Sentinels gain double.

traits.name: Spellweaver
traits.desc: Your team gains 15 Ability Power. Spellweavers gain more, plus extra Ability Power whenever a Spellweaver casts an Ability.

traits.name: Superfan
traits.desc: Superfans improve your Headliner!

traits.name: True Damage
traits.desc: True Damage champions deal bonus true damage. If they are holding an item, they gain a unique Bling Bonus for their Ability.

stats.1:
If you win player combat, Kayn becomes the Shadow Assassin. If not, he becomes Rhaast. You receive a reward based on his form every time he kills 2 enemy champions.

Shadow Assassin: 5g

Rhaast: 2 player health.

traits.name: Anima Squad
traits.desc:
At each tier, pick a weapon that a random Anima Squad champion fires periodically during combat. Anima Squad champions gain Armor, Magic Resist, and Damage Amp.

Weapons scale with Anima Squad star level and stage.

stats.3: 10 AR/MR, 5% Damage Amp, Choose a weapon
stats.5: 25 AR/MR, 10% Damage Amp, Choose a weapon
stats.7: 40 AR/MR, 15% Damage Amp, Choose a weapon
stats.10: 75 AR/MR, 100% Damage Amp, Choose an ultimate weapon

traits.name: Bastion
traits.desc:
Your team gains 10 Armor and Magic Resist. Bastions gain more.

For the first 10 seconds of combat, Bastions increase their bonus by 100%.

stats.6: 75 Armor & MR. Non-Bastions gain an additional 25 Armor & MR

traits.name: BoomBots
traits.desc: BoomBots fire a missile every 400 damage dealt at a nearby enemy that deals magic damage. 8% of damage taken contributes to damage dealt.

stats.6: Fire two missiles, each dealing 260 magic damage

traits.name: Bruiser
traits.desc: Your team gains 100 Health. Bruisers gain more.

traits.name: Strategist
traits.desc: Combat Start: Allies in the back 2 rows gain Damage Amp. Allies in the front 2 rows gain Durability. Strategists get triple.

traits.name: Executioner
traits.desc:
Executioner Abilities can critically strike. They also gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.

If the target's Health is below 20%, the bonus Critical Strike Damage is doubled.

stats.2: 25% Critical Strike Chance, 5% Critical Strike Damage
stats.3: 35% Critical Strike Chance, 10% Critical Strike Damage
stats.4: 50% Critical Strike Chance, 15% Critical Strike Damage
stats.5: 55% Critical Strike Chance, 15% Critical Strike Damage; also gain 12% Durability

traits.name: Cyberboss
traits.desc: Your strongest Cyberboss upgrades to its final form and gains Health, Ability Power, and its ability hits more enemies.

stats.4: All Cyberbosses upgrade. Your strongest Cyberboss gains 40% Health and 40 AP.

traits.name: Divinicorp
traits.desc:
Divinicorp champions grant unique stats to your team, increased for each Divinicorp in play.

Divinicorp champions gain double.

Morgana - +9% AP
Rhaast - +6 AR/MR
Senna - +8% AD
Gragas - +50 Health
Vex - +7% CSC
Renekton - +5% AS
Emblem - +3% Omnivamp

traits.name: Exotech
traits.desc: Gain unique items that can only be equipped by Exotech champions. They gain Health and Attack Speed for each item equipped.

traits.name: Nitro
traits.desc:
Every round, Nitro champions grant Chrome to R-080T, based on their star level. Each Chrome grants 14 Health and 1 Ability Power.

At 200 Chrome, it upgrades to T-43X!

Chrome per star: 2/3/7/25

traits.name: Golden Ox
traits.desc:
Golden Ox gain Damage Amp and have a chance to drop gold on kill.

If you spend 8 gold on rerolls or XP in a single turn, permanently increase their Damage Amp and the gold required for the next bonus. Rerolls count double towards gold spent.
(Golden Ox must have fought last round)

stats.6: 25% Damage Amp, 100% loot, 7% chance loot is a component

traits.name: Marksman
traits.desc: Marksmen gain Attack Damage. After 8 seconds of combat, they increase their bonus by 100%.

stats.4: 35% AD. After 8 seconds, gain 25% AD every 6 seconds.

traits.name: Syndicate
traits.desc:
Get a Kingpin hat that uniquely upgrades a Syndicate champion's ability.

Syndicate champions gain Health and Damage Amp.

stats.7: 550 Health, 20% Damage Amp, Upgrade Kingpin effect

stats.1:
After 2 player combats, open an Armory of Trait Mods that permanently reprogram a champion to benefit from a trait (but not contribute).

Every time you get a Trait Mod, the next one requires 1 additional round.

Champions can only have one Trait Mod.
The Overlord takes a bite out of the unit in the hex behind him, dealing 40% of their max Health as true damage. He gains 40% of their Health and 25% of their Attack Damage.

traits.name: Sniper
traits.desc: Sniper deal more damage to targets farther away.

traits.name: Street Demon
traits.desc:
Allies in painted hexes gain Health, Ability Power, and Attack Damage. Some hexes are Signature hexes and grant 50% more.

Street Demons double all bonuses.

stats.10: +45% Health, 45 AP, 45% AD. Paint the town!

traits.name: Slayer
traits.desc: Slayers gain Attack Damage and Omnivamp. Overhealing heals the lowest percent Health Slayer for 50% of the excess amount.

traits.name: Cypher
traits.desc:
Gain Intel by losing combat, increased for loss streaks. Gain a small amount for killing enemies.

You may trade your Intel for loot one time on round
3-3, 3-7, 4-3, 4-7, or 5-5.
After trading Intel, Cypher champions gain Attack Damage and Ability Power.

traits.name: A.M.P.
traits.desc: A.M.P. champions upgrade their abilities in unique ways with Amp. They also gain Health.

traits.name: Rapidfire
traits.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed. Rapidfire champions gain more on each attack, stacking up to 10 times.

traits.name: Techie
traits.desc:
Techies gain Ability Power.

Enemies hit by their abilities deal 10% less damage for 3 seconds.

stats.8: 140 AP. Enemies hit deal 18% less damage.

traits.name: Dynamo
traits.desc: Every 3 seconds, your team gains Mana. Dynamos gain 100% more.

traits.name: Vanguard
traits.desc:
Vanguards gain 12% Durability while Shielded.

Combat start and 50% Health: Gain a max Health Shield for 10 seconds.

stats.1: Gain a hologram copy of the highest cost enemy Viego helped kill last round. It has 900 / 1350 / 9001 Health, deals 30% / 40% / 200% damage, and has 1 recommended item.
The Virus infects your shop with a 10% chance to spawn a bloblet. When purchased, it merges and increases the strongest Zac's max Health by 3% and Ability Power by 4.

traits.name: Bilgewater
traits.desc: Your team's attacks and Abilities mark enemies. The mark stores a percentage of damage dealt to the enemy. Marked enemies are struck by a cannonball after 1.5 seconds, dealing the stored damage plus a flat value as physical damage.

stats.2: 130 + 35% damage dealt. Every 20th cannonball is replaced with a treasure chest that drops gold!

traits.name: TheBoss
traits.desc: Gain Boss Knuckles. When the holder first drops below 60% Health, they become The Boss and leave combat to start doing sit-ups. Each sit-up restores maximum Health and grants Attack Speed.

stats.2: 10% HP, 60% AS. If they reach full Health they return to combat Pumped Up: all of their attacks and abilities deal 100% of damage as true damage.

traits.name: Conqueror
traits.desc:
Your team's takedowns grant stacks of Conquest. After gaining enough Conquest, open War Chests full of loot!

Your team gains Attack Damage and Ability Power, increased by 8% for each War Chest opened.

traits.name: Coven
traits.desc:
The champion nearest to the center of your team is chosen as the Coven Leader, gaining bonus Ability Power.

Whenever your team casts an Ability, the Coven Leader gains Mana.

traits.name: Dragonlord
traits.desc: After 8 seconds of combat, the Dragon strikes the board, dealing true damage and stunning all enemies. Allies gain Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

stats.1: 12% HP Damage, Stuns for 1.5 seconds, 10% AS
stats.2: 18% HP Damage, Stuns for 2 seconds, 15% AS. After an additional 10 seconds, the Dragon strikes again.

traits.name: Elderwood
traits.desc: Every 2 seconds, your team grows, gaining bonus stats. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

traits.name: Glacial
traits.desc: Gain a Glacial Mallet. Attacks from champions holding a mallet have a 25% chance to stun their target for 1 second and deal bonus magic damage.

stats.2: 400 magic damage. Gain 1 more Glacial Mallets.

traits.name: Hellion
traits.desc: When an allied champion dies, a Doppelhellion (a one less star copy) equipped with a Red Buff will leap from the Hellion portal and join the fight!

traits.name: High Roller
traits.desc:
Gain a Sevika's Jinxed Arm!
Combat start: roll a random Jinx mod.

Mods:
- Rocket: Launch rockets at random enemies.
- Shield: Gain a shield for 8 seconds.
- Coin: Gain gold.

stats.2: Every 8 seconds. Mods are stronger, and the holder can now hit a Jinxed Jackpot!

traits.name: Imperial
traits.desc: Combat start: Select random units gain 60% Damage Amp.

traits.name: Jazz
traits.desc:
For each active trait, your team gains bonus Health and Damage Amp.
(Excludes unique and Anniversary Traits)

traits.name: Laser Corps
traits.desc: Your team gains laser drones. When a unit attacks or is hit by an attack, their drone deals magic damage to the target (0.4 second cooldown).

stats.2: 30 magic damage. All units gain an additional drone.

traits.name: Mascot
traits.desc: Your team heals a percentage of their max Health every 2 seconds. When a champion dies, they retreat to the sidelines to cheer on your team. Your team’s healing increases for each cheering champion.

stats.1: 1.5% HP base, 1% HP per cheering champion
stats.2: 7.5% HP base, 1.5% HP per cheering champion

traits.name: Mech-Pilot
traits.desc:
Use the Pilot Selector to choose a Pilot. Combat start: the Pilot jumps into a Mech.

The Mech has the Traits and items of its Pilot, and gains a percentage of the pilot’s Attack Damage and max Health. When the Mech dies, the Pilot is ejected with a percentage of their max Health.

stats.2: Super-Mech: 55% AD/HP. The 2 nearest units to the Pilot also jump into the Mech.

traits.name: Mountain
traits.desc:
Gain 2 Mountain hexes in the front row.
Combat start: Units standing on a Mountain hex gain a Shield and permanent bonus Health.

stats.2: 600 Shield, 60 HP. The entire front row becomes Mountain hexes.

traits.name: Phantom
traits.desc: Combat start: random enemies have their Health reduced.

stats.1: Set 1 enemy's Health to 30% maximum Health.
stats.2: Set 2 enemy's Health to 100 maximum Health.

traits.name: Preserver
traits.desc: Your team heals for a percent of their Max Health every 3 seconds. If they are full Health, restore Mana instead.

stats.2: 7% HP, and 9% MP. Always get both.

traits.name: Punk
traits.desc:
Your team gain bonus Health, Attack Damage and Ability Power, which increases by 1% every time you spend gold on a Shop reroll.

After each combat, gain a 1 gold reroll for that round. Your first reroll each round grants 3% bonus instead!

traits.name: Pyro
traits.desc:
Your team gains 1% Attack Speed.

For each kill, your team creates an infernal cinder that you collect the next round. For every 5 cinders you collect, your team gains 2 more Attack Speed.

stats.2: 2 infernal cinders per enemy and execute enemies under 12% Health.

traits.name: Rebel
traits.desc: Combat start: for 12 seconds, your team gains a Shield and Damage Amp for each adjacent ally.

traits.name: Shimmerscale
traits.desc: Gain Shimmerscale items. These items give gold as well as combat power.

stats.1: Gain Goldmancers Staff. At Stage 3-1 gain Draven's Axe.

traits.name: Shurima
traits.desc: Combat start: select champions Ascend and gain 35% maximum Health and 40% Attack Speed.

stats.1: The strongest champion Ascends after 8 seconds.

traits.name: Socialite
traits.desc:
Gain a spotlight hex.
Combat start: the unit standing in the spotlight gains bonus stats.

stats.1: 20% Damage Amp and 5 Mana per second.
stats.2: 60% Damage Amp, 5 Mana per second, and 15% Omnivamp. Gain another spotlight hex.

traits.name: Storyweaver
traits.desc: Summon a Hero named Kayle and evolve her as you level up!

stats.1: When you reach level 5, Kayle upgrades to 2-star. Pick a supportive effect.
stats.2:
Kayle evolves again at levels 6, 8 and 10
Level 6: Pick a combat effect.
Level 8: Kayle upgrades to 3-star. Pick a combat effect.
Level 10: Kayle upgrades to 4-star.

traits.name: Trainer
traits.desc: After combat, the 3 champions closest to Nomsy feed her 1 Snax per star level, adding Health and Ability Power. Nomsy's star level increases every 25 Snax!

traits.name: Yordle
traits.desc: After each player combat, a random 1, 2 or 3 cost champion that usually fits your team is added to your bench for free.

stats.2: If you have 5 or more 3 star champions, you instead gain a Yordle-Lord.

stats.1: Yordle-Lord Veigar and his Furyhorns are crashing Pengu's Party!
